content:
Calvary Chapel Men's Retreat 2003
Friday September 25th - Monday September 27th
Here is some Real Video from last year's retreat! You will need the RealOne player to view it.
If you don't have a RealOne video player, you can click on the RealOne Website link below to download a free version of the RealOne player to view the 2002 Men's Retreat video.
To obtain a free RealOne Media Player, visit the RealOne Player Website.
